short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the mousewheel to easily scroll between monthly calendars.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What's new:
1.2:
* updated to comply with Google's manifest V3

1.1.1:
* Compressed images to decrease extension package size

1.1.0:
* Added option to set Monday as the first day of the week
* Added customizable Special Dates list up to 50 special dates
